security.csp: default-src 'self' tauri://localhost; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' blob:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' https: data: *; connect-src 'self' https: http: *; media-src 'self' tauri://localhost blob: https: *; worker-src 'self' blob:; font-src 'self' https: data: tauri://localhost; upgrade-insecure-requests;
